item.description:
Hike 9.8 mile round trip out to and over North and South Hancock. Microspikes (or equivelant), snowshoes, and all relevant winter hiking gear required. Be ready to hike at 8AM.

If there is interest in hiking the Tripyrimids on Sunday I would entertain staying in Lincoln Saturday night and getting an early start on Sunday Feb 5th.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the trail head at the hairpin turn on the Kanc. Willing to arrange carpool from southern NH
item.name: North and South Hancock
